summary: The implementation comprehensively addresses all six requirements. The frontend includes a hero homepage with school branding, student directory with filtering, announcements with timestamps, class schedules by grade, events calendar, and a consistent navy/gold educational theme. The backend (Motoko) provides persistent storage for all data types with proper authentication and authorization controls.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile system with ProfileSetupModal requiring name and role on first login
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify any user profile management or registration flow. The authorization system and profile setup modal are not part of the stated requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin/user role-based access control system with permission checks
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention role-based access control, admin roles, or permission systems. Requirements only mention 'school administrators can post' but do not specify a formal authorization system.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin token initialization system via URL parameter
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify any admin initialization mechanism or secret token system for bootstrapping access control.

hallucinated_features.description: Theme toggle with dark mode support
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies a single educational theme with warm colors but does not request dark mode or theme switching functionality.
